title: Pixel complaint
content:
I got a pixel 3xl which got a esim issue and battery 
And there were probably like patches on the display but no Physical or liquid damage once I submitted to the factory in india they told me if we try to open the device the display will be broken but the display was working fine there were no Physical damage so I denied to open the device but inspite of them they opened the device 

And they send the device unrepaired when I collected the device the device display started having lines and got a scratch inside the display and the device back pannel was too received opened.

This was not the same condition of the device when I submitted them and device is in warranty 

So please help
